name: The Spawn of Hell
description: This game is a horror game where you have to run and escape from a giant pumpkin monster. 57 years ago, the residents of this remote village were tormented by a demon summoned in a sacrificial ritual. You have heard legends of his demon and have always had an interest in the paranormal and decided to come to the village and explore it for yourself. As it turns out, the demon is greatly disturbed by your presence and has cursed you with a monster sent to hunt you for the rest of eternity.
